extendedInfo.description: The Magic Work Cycle is a powerful productivity technique. It's also very simple. Work for thirty minutes, giving all of your attention to whatever project you are working on. After thirty minutes, take a break for thirty minutes. You can do anything you want to take your mind off of your work. Then repeat again with thirty minutes of work. Be amazed at your increase in productivity! Then experiment with different work and play times to find what best suits you.(This free application is inspired by Chetan Surpur's 30/30 Minute Work Cycle life hack and magicworkcycle.com.)

reviews.title: No background mode?
reviews.comment: The timers seem to reset if the app is not the one with focus. This means you have to keep the app running for the it to work, making your phone unusable. Totally worthless app unless I\'m missing something.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It stops working once you do anything else with your phone. Not reliable means pointless for an app like this. Someone else make a better one!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I want to love this but...
reviews.comment: First, thanks to the to the developers for making it. Okay so I want to love this app, but it resets the clock when the app loses focus. Five stars otherwise
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Has Issues
reviews.comment: The app only works when it has focus. If it loses focus it resets the clock. Also has bugs with exit button and context stack.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally
reviews.comment: Thanx for bringing this to android!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
